AboutMe: Welcome to my website! I’m a freshman at University of Calfornia, Santa Barbara studying Statistics and Data Science. I’m dedicated in creating full stack web applications with React and Node.js, and I am looking for an internship to improve my skills

BeckmanApp.title: Beckman High School Admin App
description: Programmed a Sign-in and Reset Password page with authentication to secure privacy for admins who wish to verify or deny a student's digitized id
Generated a list of students who have a verified school ID. includes filter feature.

AmazonChecker.title: Amazon Price Detector
description: Designed and implemented a form using React that allows users to input their email and a link to an amazon product in order to send the user an email when the price of the product drops.
Built RESTful APIs with express in Node.js to send and retrieve information from a database
